species.name: Rodian
species.description: Rodians evolved from climbing lizards and retain some of their ancestor's characteristics, particularly the large eyes and climbing suction cups on their fingers and toes. Nowadays, those physical features cannot hold an adult Rodian of 1.6 meters to a rock or tree for very long, but they have saved many Rodians from falls that would kill most other species.
species.startSkills: Begin game with 1 rank in Survival and 1 rank in Expert Tracker talent.
